name: BluePOS
short_description:
BluePOS is a fully functioned POS designed for retailers. Modules include POS, Special (Customer) Orders, Invoicing, Purchasing, Receiving, Returns. It includes basic debtors and creditors modules including statement processing

There are over 150 reports including sales grouped by department, supplier, category etc.

Designed for an environment that has a large number of stock lines, BluePOS features innovative in-line lookup for items based on 2 ID fields (eg, Barcode or suppliers ID) as well as title, description, supplier etc to maximise the speed of sales and reduce the "hunt and peck" method of item look up.
